qas.question: What will be created in the medieval triforium?
What has been designed to help with the gallery?
When will the new galleries open?
What will be destroyed in the medieval triforium?
What will be created in the medieval biforium?
What has been undesigned to help with the gallery?
When will the new galleries close?
When will the old galleries open?

context: A project that is proceeding is the creation of <a0_0><b3_0><b4_0>The Queen's Diamond Jubilee Galleries<b4_0/><b3_0/><a0_0/> in the medieval triforium of the abbey. The aim is to create a new display area for the abbey's treasures in the galleries high up around the abbey's nave. To this end a new <a1_0><b5_0>Gothic access tower with lift<b5_0/><a1_0/> has been designed by the abbey architect and Surveyor of the Fabric, Ptolemy Dean. It is planned that the new galleries will open in <a2_0><b6_0><b7_0>2018<b7_0/><b6_0/><a2_0/>.
